title: Five Bedroom House for Sale in Dehiwala
location: Lotus Grove, Captain Sumudu Rajapaksa Mawatha, Hill Street, Dehiwala
details:
Meticulously maintained five bedroom house located in the secluded gated community of Lotus Grove, Dehiwala. Conveniently located only 750 meters away from Hill Street, Dehiwala; within close proximity to all modern day conveniences. The house has been thoughtfully designed and constructed to exceptional standards by Tudawe Brothers (Pvt) Ltd.

The property offers extensive living space along with a total of five bedrooms and three bathrooms. The house features a spacious living and dining area, fully fitted pantry, separate wet kitchen and landscaped rear garden. A well configured, beautifully designed family house in an impressive residential locality.

- Constructed in 1996, renovated and refurnished in 2003.
- Five bedrooms. Two bedrooms equipped with A/C.
- Three bathrooms equipped with solar powered hot water system. Separate powder room.
- Spacious living & dining room.
- Separate maids quarters.
- Covered parking for one vehicle. Driveway allows parking for second vehicle within premises.
- Pressure Pump, Lighting Conductor & Alarm System [Needs to be re-activated by battery replacement].
- Common facilities include 24-hour security, swimming pool, gymnasium, outdoor function area, children's play area, squash, badminton and tennis courts.

Price negotiable upon inspection only.

Viewings can be arranged by prior appointment only,
